name: SONAR - Oceania Mining Co.
description:
“Do you want to see the world? (Or at least the Seven Seas?) Can you work under pressure and be your own boss? The Oceania Mining Co. Deep Sea Resource Requisition Unit wants you! Delve deep into the unknown, armed with top of the line equipment. Join our global work-family today!”
-Oceania Mining Co. recruitment poster

DELVE UNDER THE WAVES

You’ve been collecting resources for the Oceania Mining Co. for most of your adult life. With countless work assignments completed in your trusty Deep Sea Resource Storage and Processing Unit™, this one should have been a breeze! But something went wrong…

You find yourself all alone, in the crushing depths of the sea, sitting next to a dead console. Words “Critical System Failure” pulsing red light into your tired eyes. You know time is running out. You know, that your only hope of survival is venturing into the dark, deep unknown to find enough Scrap and Uranium to repair the ship.

You know the SecureSalvage™ drones are on their way.

You know what happens if they find you…

GAMEPLAY

Navigate the depths in your trusty Deep Sea Resource Collection Submarine™, using the right mouse button on your control console.

Defeat the drones sent to salvage you, and salvage them first! Break the loot boxes and bring the resources back to your Deep Sea Storage and Processing Unit™, to get it moving again, and get home safe.

Take care when navigating the deep, though.

Your DeepScan™ sonar only activates every 10 seconds, and who knows what is waiting for you just outside your field of vision.

Speaking of which, to adjust your field of vision use the mouse scroll wheel on your control console.

If you do run into trouble, do not panic! Simply point your Rapid Kinetic Disassembly™ probe towards the problem, press the left mouse button on your control console, and keep a safe distance!

Also, try not to dive too deep, or you will be crushed like a tin can.

If that sounds like too much to deal with, fear not! Your Deep Sea Resource Collection Submarine™ comes equipped with a cutting-edge modular Field Upgrade System™.

Simply divert some of the resources you’ve salvaged into your built-in workshop by using the spacebar on your control panel to select your submarine, and our Field Upgrade™ system will do the rest!

Upgrade your Hull to dive deeper, Turbine to swim faster or Sonar to see further!
